col.description: The number of columns in the grid

border.description: Whether to display the border of the grid

align.description: The alignment of the grids, which is used to control the alignment scene when there are only one or two grids
align.description_zh: 宫格的对齐方式，用于控制只有一两个宫格时的对齐场景

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a grid is clicked
